root.description: A wooden [bridge] passing over a dark, shallow stream.
root.hint: Geralt: "Hm. A book in the middle of the woods? Better take a closer look."

exit.description: The black, thorn-ridden [woods] lie on one side of the [bridge].
exit.onCheck: The [woods] are dark, and a chill breeze blows from them.

exit.description: A [clearing] can be seen on the other side.
exit.onCheck: Stars speckle the sky above the [clearing].

prop.onCheck: Sparse wood planks decay atop two mossy logs. The planks creak under your weight.

prop.description: Though rotting and rarely trod, the [bridge] has seen use of late. One who recently crossed this way let fall a thin [book], which now rests in the middle of the bridge.
prop.onCheck: The cover has a hand-written title: Joss's Survival Guide. Most of its pages have been torn out. One of the remaining pages reads: "To see what items you are carrying with you, type "inventory" and hit ENTER."
